pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatio-Temporal Autologistic Regression Model // Estimates the coefficients of the two-time centered autologistic regression model based on Gegout-Petit A., Guerin-Dubrana L., Li S. "A new centered spatio-temporal autologistic regression model. Application to local spread of plant diseases." 2019. arXiv:1811.06782, using a grid of binary variables to estimate the spread of a disease on the grid over the years.
